channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A number of used empty Nitrous Oxide containers., 6th January
item.description:
Two boxes of empty nitrous oxide containers. Catering sized containers which have been dumped on pavement under next to tree. Near junction with Aldermary Road. One box been there for some weeks and another box added recently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holligrave Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car?, 6th January
item.description:
Hello, The car in the pictures has been parked in the exact spot on Wellington Road, Belvedere for approx. a month. It appears to be taxed. To me it looks abandoned; I pass by it everyday and the front-left window is always open.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Road, Upper Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish/fly tipping, 6th January
item.description:
2 of my neighbours are fly tipping/ throwing their rubbish constantly outside. It’s becoming harder to park and we have seen rats

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingfisher Close, Greater London

item.title: Regular takeaway left from business opposite, 6th January
item.description:
I am reporting a persistent street litter issue opposite Sirac Kebab House. The waste is takeaway packaging from customers littering rather than using the public bin located at the entrance to the path. I’d appreciate engagement with the business on this

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: These appeared on the pavement outside my flat on new years morning, 6th January
item.description:
They have just been dumped outside my house on the pavement and have been there since new year morning

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belvoir Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish bin overflowing, dumping of rubbish, 6th January
item.description:
For the second time in recent weeks, this property that is being used as a air BnB has yet again overflowing bins and who ever is staying there has also decided to dump rubbish in other people's bins and in the street. Please can we have this sorted once and for all as this is becoming a regular thing!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unchecked littering, 6th January
item.description:
I've just started coming to the area regularly for work and have been horrified by the rubbish in the grass verges and along the sides of pavements. After Christmas the clothes recycling bins were overflowing out onto the street. There is often rubbish in the little river by Asda and plastic bags in trees and bushes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Road, Chislehurst, Greater London

item.title: Side of 120 Godstow Road: black sacks., 6th January
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Godstow Road, Abbey Wood

item.title: Our shutters (x6) have been graffitied, 6th January
